member.name: M:FinanceManager.Tests.Integration.ApiClient.ApiClientBudgetKpiContactsSetupTests.ValidateBudgetReportExport(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Validates the budget report XLSX export and builds a map of sheet data. Exposed as a separate helper to keep tests concise.

member.name: T:FinanceManager.Tests.Integration.ApiClient.ApiClientBudgetReportUnbudgetedMirrorTests
member.summary: Integration tests for the Budget Report Unbudgeted Mirror functionality.

member.name: M:FinanceManager.Tests.Integration.ApiClient.ApiClientBudgetReportUnbudgetedMirrorTests.#ctor(FinanceManager.Tests.Integration.TestWebApplicationFactory)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ApiClientBudgetReportUnbudgetedMirrorTests class using the specified test web application factory. This constructor sets up the integration test environment for budget report functionality.
member.param: The TestWebApplicationFactory used to create a test server for the API client. Must not be null.

member.name: M:FinanceManager.Tests.Integration.ApiClient.ApiClientBudgetReportUnbudgetedMirrorTests.BudgetReport_UnbudgetedPostings_ShouldOnlyContainNonMirroredSelfContactPostings_WhenSavingsPlanPostingsMirrorSelfContact
member.summary: Integrationstest: Wenn Sparplan-Buchungen auf das Self-Konto gespiegelt werden, müssen die Unbudgeted-Endpunkte die gespiegelten Self-Buchungen herausfiltern und nur tatsächlich ungeplante Self-Postings zurückgeben (hier: +12,34 €).

member.name: P:FinanceManager.Tests.Integration.TestWebApplicationFactory.FixedUtcNow
member.summary: When set, the factory will register an IDateTimeProvider that returns this fixed UTC time. Set this property in tests before calling CreateClient() to force server-side "now".
